response.overview: Letha and Aldo are a couple whose love seems effortless, filled with laughter, stolen moments, and quiet joys of togetherness. Their world pulses with intimacy and connection, a celebration of youth and the thrill of being seen by someone who truly cares. But beneath the surface of this seemingly perfect bond lies the fragile, unpredictable nature of human connection. Tender, fleeting, and at times as elusive as water itself.
response.title: Remnants
